sourcesContent:
import React, {useContext} from 'react' import { TasksContext } from '../context' import checkIcon from '../assets/images/check-circle.png' import greenCheckIcon from '../assets/images/check-circle-green.png' import trashIcon from '../assets/images/trash-red.png' import editIcon from '../assets/images/edit-green.png' const Task = ({data}) => { const {checkTask, setModal} = useContext(TasksContext) function handleClick(e) { switch(e.target.name){ case 'editBtn': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'EDIT'}) break case 'deleteBtn': setModal({opened: true, taskid: data.id, type: 'DELETE'}) break default: break } } return (
checkTask(data.id)} /> {data.title}

{data.desc}

) } export default Task
